0.text: Innate: Periodically, Illaoi spawns a Tentacle on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are  untargetable in the meantime.  Tentacles are commanded to attack by Illaoi's abilities.
0.html:
Innate: Periodically, Illaoi spawns a Tentacle on the nearest terrain perpendicular to her location, if no other Tentacles are already nearby it. Tentacles fully spawn after a 2 second delay and are untargetable in the meantime.
Tentacles are commanded to attack by Illaoi's abilities.
markedPassages: untargetable

1.text: See Pets for more details about Tentacles.
1.html: See Pets for more details about Tentacles.
possibleConcerningAbilities: See Pets for more details about Tentacles.

1.text: Active: Illaoi slams down a Tentacle in the target direction.
1.html: Active: Illaoi slams down a Tentacle in the target direction.

0.text: Active: Illaoi's next basic attack within 6 seconds gains  225 bonus range and causes her to  leap to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.
0.html: Active: Illaoi's next basic attack within 6 seconds gains  225 bonus range and causes her to leap to the target's location if they're beyond her normal basic attack range.
markedPassages: 225 bonus range
leap

1.text: The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against  turrets.
1.html: The attack deals bonus physical damage, with a minimum threshold, and capped at 300 against non-champions, and commands all Tentacles in range to attack the target. The minimum bonus damage can also be applied against turrets.

0.content: 3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 4% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health

markedPassages: turrets
3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 4% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health
3 / 3.5 / 4 / 4.5 / 5% (+ 4% per 100 AD) of target's maximum health

2.text: Harsh Lesson  resets Illaoi's basic attack timer.
2.html: Harsh Lesson resets Illaoi's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Harsh Lesson

3.text: Harsh Lesson can be activated during Illaoi's other abilities, other than while  pulling a Spirit.
3.html: Harsh Lesson can be activated during Illaoi's other abilities, other than while pulling a Spirit.
markedPassages: pulling
possibleConcerningAbilities: Harsh Lesson can be activated during Illaoi's other abilities, other than while  pulling a Spirit.

0.text: Active: Illaoi launches a tendril in the target direction that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their Spirit out in front of Illaoi over 0.75 seconds if they're a  champion. The target is  tethered to the Spirit for 7 seconds,  revealing them in addition to granting  sight of the area around them while the tether remains.
0.html: Active: Illaoi launches a tendril in the target direction that stops at the first enemy hit, pulling their Spirit out in front of Illaoi over 0.75 seconds if they're a champion. The target is tethered to the Spirit for 7 seconds, revealing them in addition to granting sight of the area around them while the tether remains.
markedPassages: champion
tethered
revealing
sight

1.text: The Spirit spawns with the target's  current health,  armor and  magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.
1.html: The Spirit spawns with the target's  current health,  armor and  magic resist, and redirects a portion of the pre-mitigation damage received to the tethered champion.
markedPassages: current health
armor
magic resist

2.text: When the Spirit is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a Vessel for 10 seconds and  slowing them by 80% for 1.5 seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each Tentacle autonomously attacks the closest Vessel or Spirit, prioritizing the latter, once every 5.5 / 4.5 / 3.5 (based on level) seconds.
2.html: When the Spirit is killed or the target leaves tether range, the tether is severed, marking the target as a Vessel for 10 seconds and slowing them by 80% for 1.5 seconds once the tether returns back to them. Each Tentacle autonomously attacks the closest Vessel or Spirit, prioritizing the latter, once every 5.5 / 4.5 / 3.5 (based on level) seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

3.text: Enemies made a Vessel also spawn a Tentacle near themselves every 5 / 4 / 3 (based on level) seconds. Tentacles can spawn 250 units closer to each other than when spawned by Illaoi.
3.html: Enemies made a Vessel also spawn a Tentacle near themselves every 5 / 4 / 3 (based on level) seconds. Tentacles can spawn 250 units closer to each other than when spawned by Illaoi.

4.text:
Illaoi is  unable to act while firing the projectile and while the target's Spirit is being pulled.
Illaoi cannot cast Test of Spirit again until the Spirit dies.

Vessels can dispel the debuff by scoring a  takedown against Illaoi.
4.html:
Illaoi is unable to act while firing the projectile and while the target's Spirit is being pulled.

Illaoi cannot cast Test of Spirit again until the Spirit dies.

Vessels can dispel the debuff by scoring a takedown against Illaoi.
markedPassages: unable to act
takedown
possibleConcerningAbilities: Illaoi is  unable to act while firing the projectile and while the target's Spirit is being pulled.
Illaoi cannot cast Test of Spirit again until the Spirit dies.
Vessels can dispel the debuff by scoring a  takedown against Illaoi.

0.text: Active: Illaoi gains  displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).
0.html: Active: Illaoi gains displacement immunity and leaps into the air for the cast time. She then slams her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. For each enemy champion hit, a Tentacle is summoned for 8 seconds (up to a maximum of 6 summons).
markedPassages: displacement immunity

1.text: For the duration,  Harsh Lesson's  cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are  untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack. This however does not affect the Tentacle attack from  Tentacle Smash.
1.html: For the duration, Harsh Lesson's  cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack. This however does not affect the Tentacle attack from Tentacle Smash.

cooldown
untargetable

textContent.text: For the duration,  Harsh Lesson's  cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are  untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack. This however does not affect the Tentacle attack from  Tentacle Smash.
textContent.html: For the duration, Harsh Lesson's  cooldown is halved, all Tentacles awakened by Illaoi are untargetable, will not show their hitboxes, nor go dormant, and will take half the amount of time to make an attack. This however does not affect the Tentacle attack from Tentacle Smash.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Harsh Lesson's
Tentacle Smash

Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).
passive.originText: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (3 charges).

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.
consume.originText: Consumes a charge to regenerate 4.166 health and 3.125 mana every 0.5 seconds over 12 seconds, for a total of 100 health and 75 mana. During this time, damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions burn them, dealing 15 bonus magic damage over 3 seconds, increased to 20 while the user cannot regenerate mana. Bonus damage is halved if applied by area of effect or damage over time.

1.originHTML: +  350

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+50 attack damage
+30 ability haste
+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

Keywords

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+50 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spellblade: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by ( 15% / 7.5%) (+ ( 0.4% / 0.2%) per 100 maximum health). Your primary target is slowed for double the amount and has their damage against you reduced by 10% for 2.5 seconds (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 50 bonus health and 5% tenacity and slow resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLBLADE: After using an ability, your next basic attack within 10 seconds deals 100% base AD bonus physical damage on-hit and creates a 300 radius frost field for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the field are slowed by ( 15% /  7.5%) (+ ( 0.4% /  0.2%) per 100 maximum health). Your primary target is slowed for double the amount and has their damage against you reduced by 10% for 2.5 seconds (1.5 (begins after using the empowered attack) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  +  700

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – The Claws that Catch: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 50% base AD.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, gain a shield equal to 80% of bonus health that decays over 4.5 seconds (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THE CLAWS THAT CATCH: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 50% base AD.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage and heals you for 50% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on  shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
